content: Subzone of Sembawang Planning Area in Singapore **Senoko** (*s…ô-NOH-koh*) is located in [Sembawang](/wiki/Sembawang), in the northern part of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It is most known for [Senoko Power Station](/wiki/Senoko_Power_Station), which generates and supplies [electricity](/wiki/Electricity), and the Senoko Fishing Port. ## Etymology In [Franklin and Jackson's *Plan of Singapore*](/wiki/Jackson_Plan) (1830), the place name ***Senoko*** was found and referred to the "River Simko" or *Sungei Senoko* in [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language). The river is now merged into Sungei Sembawang, which currently has the mouth of the former Sungei Senoko. ## Transportation [Tower Transit Singapore](/wiki/Tower_Transit_Singapore) Service 981 goes to Senoko Industrial Estate, while [Tower Transit Singapore](/wiki/Tower_Transit_Singapore) Services 169 and 856 plies through Admiralty Road West. The closest MRT line is [Woodlands North MRT station](/wiki/Woodlands_North_MRT_station) located at Woodlands North Coast Road. - Victor R Savage, Brenda S A Yeoh (2004), *Toponymics - A Study of Singapore Street Names*, Eastern University Press, [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 981-210-364-3 This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Senoko
